description: This file defines a React component for a Jira Projects page, allowing users to search and create Jira projects via API calls. It manages input states, handles asynchronous API interactions, and renders UI elements including input fields, buttons, and result display.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Handles searching Jira projects via invokeTool API call and updates the component state with the result or error.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles creating a new Jira project via invokeTool API call and updates the component state with the result or error.
